instruction: Write a short story inspired by a given painting (text), then create a soundtrack for the story (audio), and finally produce a digital book cover (image).
output-abstract: 1. Short story, 2. Soundtrack, 3. Digital book cover.
output-detail: 1. Short story: Interpret the emotions and scenery depicted in the painting to construct a narrative. 2. Soundtrack: Compose music that reflects the story's mood and main themes. 3. Digital book cover: Design a cover that captures the essence of the story and its soundtrack, incorporating key elements from both.

instruction: Develop a language learning app including introductory lessons (text and audio), interactive exercises (text and video), and pronunciation guides (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Introductory lessons, 2. Interactive exercises, 3. Pronunciation guides.
output-detail: 1. Introductory lessons: Write short text lessons and record corresponding audio for basic phrases. 2. Interactive exercises: Create video demonstrations of real-life conversations with embedded text questions for user interaction. 3. Pronunciation guides: Record audio guides emphasizing tricky phonetics, with examples.

instruction: Organize a virtual art exhibition with an introductory video (video), a catalogue of artworks (image and text), and an interactive Q&A session with artists (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Introductory video, 2. Art catalogue, 3. Q&A session.
output-detail: 1. Introductory video: Produce a compelling video introducing the theme of the exhibition. 2. Art catalogue: Compile images of the artworks with descriptive text for each piece. 3. Q&A session: Arrange a live audio session where attendees can ask artists questions.

instruction: Create an instructional cooking video series featuring a main dish (video), a downloadable recipe booklet (text and image), and an ambient kitchen playlist (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Cooking video, 2. Recipe booklet, 3. Kitchen playlist.
output-detail: 1. Cooking video: Film step-by-step cooking instructions, emphasizing techniques. 2. Recipe booklet: Design a booklet with detailed recipes and high-quality images of the dishes. 3. Kitchen playlist: Curate a playlist of music to set a pleasant cooking ambiance.

instruction: Design a digital marketing campaign for a new smartphone, including a product launch video (video), infographics on features (image), customer testimonials (audio), and a press release (text).
output-abstract: 1. Launch video, 2. Infographics, 3. Testimonials, 4. Press release.
output-detail: 1. Launch video: Create a dynamic video showcasing the phone’s innovative features. 2. Infographics: Design visuals summarizing key features and benefits. 3. Testimonials: Record genuine user feedback highlighting their positive experiences. 4. Press release: Write an engaging announcement detailing the phone’s release and unique selling points.

instruction: Produce a mini-documentary on a historical event, including a narrative script (text), archival photographs (image), expert interviews (audio), and reenactment scenes (video).
output-abstract: 1. Narrative script, 2. Archival photos, 3. Expert interviews, 4. Reenactments.
output-detail: 1. Narrative script: Write a compelling script that provides a chronological account of the event. 2. Archival photos: Collect and digitize relevant photographs to support the narrative. 3. Expert interviews: Record audio interviews with historians or eyewitnesses. 4. Reenactments: Film key scenes to visually represent the event.

instruction: Develop a personal brand by creating a logo (image), a mission statement (text), a portfolio website (text, image, video), and a signature jingle (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Logo, 2. Mission statement, 3. Portfolio website, 4. Jingle.
output-detail: 1. Logo: Design a memorable emblem that visually communicates your brand identity. 2. Mission statement: Write a concise text articulating your values and goals. 3. Portfolio website: Build a site featuring text about your work, image galleries, and video presentations. 4. Jingle: Compose a catchy musical motif that embodies your brand's spirit.

instruction: Compose an educational video lesson on environmental conservation (video), followed by an interactive quiz (text and image), and a fieldwork guide pamphlet (text and image).
output-abstract: 1. Video lesson, 2. Interactive quiz, 3. Fieldwork guide.
output-detail: 1. Video lesson: Produce a video explaining the importance of conservation, with examples of successful efforts. 2. Interactive quiz: Create a quiz with questions related to the video lesson, incorporating images for visual aid. 3. Fieldwork guide: Write and design a pamphlet providing instructions and tips for conducting local conservation efforts.

instruction: Create a promotional package for a jazz festival, including a highlight reel from past festivals (video), artist bios and performance schedules (text and image), and recordings of select performances (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Highlight reel, 2. Artist bios and schedules, 3. Performance recordings.
output-detail: 1. Highlight reel: Edit footage from previous festivals to showcase the event's vibrancy and diversity. 2. Artist bios and schedules: Compile text profiles of performing artists alongside their photos and the event schedule. 3. Performance recordings: Share audio recordings from past performances to attract and entice potential attendees.

instruction: Design a virtual museum exhibit about ancient civilizations, including a guided tour narration (audio), interactive maps (image), detailed artifact descriptions (text), and virtual reality simulations (video).
output-abstract: 1. Narration, 2. Interactive maps, 3. Artifact descriptions, 4. VR simulations.
output-detail: 1. Narration: Record comprehensive audio guides covering various aspects of the civilizations. 2. Interactive maps: Create detailed maps showing the geographical spread and key sites. 3. Artifact descriptions: Write insightful descriptions for each displayed item. 4. VR simulations: Develop immersive video content that simulates walking through ancient cities and interacting with the environment.

instruction: Produce a wellness podcast series featuring meditation sessions (audio), informational guides on stress management (text), visual breathing exercise guides (image), and guest interviews on personal wellness journeys (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Meditation sessions, 2. Stress management guides, 3. Breathing exercises, 4. Guest interviews.
output-detail: 1. Meditation sessions: Record audio sessions guiding listeners through various meditation techniques. 2. Stress management guides: Write articles offering advice and strategies for coping with stress. 3. Breathing exercises: Design visual aids for practicing different breathing techniques. 4. Guest interviews: Conduct and record interviews with individuals sharing their wellness and mental health experiences.

instruction: Compile a comprehensive travel guide for a major city, including a welcome introduction (audio), top attractions brochure (text and image), recommended itineraries (text), and a series of short travel vlogs (video).
output-abstract: 1. Introduction, 2. Top attractions, 3. Itineraries, 4. Travel vlogs.
output-detail: 1. Introduction: Record an engaging audio message that captures the essence of the city. 2. Top attractions brochure: Write descriptions and include photographs of must-see sites. 3. Itineraries: Detail daily plans for various types of visitors. 4. Travel vlogs: Produce video diaries highlighting personal experiences at recommended locations.

instruction: Launch a recipe blog with step-by-step cooking instructions (text), high-resolution dish photos (image), tutorial videos for complex techniques (video), and a podcast series interviewing professional chefs (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Cooking instructions, 2. Dish photos, 3. Tutorial videos, 4. Chef interviews.
output-detail: 1. Cooking instructions: Write clear, concise directions for each recipe. 2. Dish photos: Capture and post appealing images of the finished dishes. 3. Tutorial videos: Record and edit how-to videos for recipes requiring intricate skills. 4. Chef interviews: Produce a podcast featuring conversations with chefs sharing insights and stories.

instruction: Develop a corporate training program including an orientation video (video), an interactive employee handbook (text and image), role-specific training modules (text, image, video), and motivational seminars (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Orientation video, 2. Employee handbook, 3. Training modules, 4. Seminars.
output-detail: 1. Orientation video: Create a welcoming video introducing new hires to the company culture. 2. Employee handbook: Compile an engaging digital handbook with clickable images for different sections. 3. Training modules: Develop comprehensive training content customized for various roles, incorporating text, images, and video for an immersive learning experience. 4. Seminars: Record audio sessions focusing on motivation, goal-setting, and personal development.

instruction: Create content for a fitness app including instructional workout videos (video), nutritional guides (text and image), progress tracking tools (text), and motivational speeches (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Workout videos, 2. Nutritional guides, 3. Progress tracking, 4. Motivational speeches.
output-detail: 1. Workout videos: Film a series of clear, easy-to-follow exercise demonstrations. 2. Nutritional guides: Write and illustrate articles on healthy eating habits, meal planning, and ingredient benefits. 3. Progress tracking: Develop an interface for users to log their workouts, meals, and weight changes. 4. Motivational speeches: Record inspiring talks on overcoming challenges and achieving fitness goals.

instruction: Produce an anthology of science fiction stories (text), with each story accompanied by its own original soundtrack (audio), a series of conceptual art (image), and trailers (video).
output-abstract: 1. Science fiction stories, 2. Original soundtracks, 3. Conceptual art, 4. Trailers.
output-detail: 1. Science fiction stories: Write engaging and innovative short stories exploring futuristic themes. 2. Original soundtracks: Compose unique musical pieces that reflect the mood and themes of each story. 3. Conceptual art: Design a range of artworks that visually represent the stories’ settings, characters, and key events. 4. Trailers: Create brief video trailers that tease the plot and atmosphere of the stories, incorporating the soundtracks and artworks.

instruction: Design a social media campaign to promote renewable energy, including informative posts (text and image), an engaging explainer video (video), interactive polls (text), and podcast episodes discussing the technology and benefits (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Informative posts, 2. Explainer video, 3. Interactive polls, 4. Podcast episodes.
output-detail: 1. Informative posts: Create visually appealing graphics paired with concise text to highlight key facts about renewable energy. 2. Explainer video: Produce a short, captivating video that breaks down how renewable energy works and why it's important. 3. Interactive polls: Engage the audience with polls to gather opinions on renewable energy topics. 4. Podcast episodes: Record discussions with experts on advancements in renewable energy, its economic impact, and environmental benefits.

instruction: Develop a children's educational program featuring animated stories (video), sing-along songs (audio), interactive e-books (text and image), and character voice messages as learning aids (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Animated stories, 2. Sing-along songs, 3. Interactive e-books, 4. Voice messages.
output-detail: 1. Animated stories: Create engaging animations that incorporate fundamental lessons (e.g., alphabet, counting). 2. Sing-along songs: Compose catchy tunes that reinforce educational themes. 3. Interactive e-books: Design e-books with stories and activities that include clickable elements for interactive learning. 4. Voice messages: Record messages from characters in the stories giving educational tips and encouragement.

instruction: Launch an online art class platform offering video tutorials (video), a digital textbook (text and image), live critique sessions (audio), and a virtual gallery for student works (image).
output-abstract: 1. Video tutorials, 2. Digital textbook, 3. Live critiques, 4. Virtual gallery.
output-detail: 1. Video tutorials: Record comprehensive lessons on various art techniques and theories. 2. Digital textbook: Write and compile a textbook with images illustrating different art styles and historical contexts. 3. Live critiques: Host audio sessions where students can receive real-time feedback on their work. 4. Virtual gallery: Set up an online space where students can display and view each other’s artwork.

instruction: Create a series of marketing materials for a tech startup, including a company backstory video (video), product data sheets (text and image), customer success stories (audio), and an interactive FAQ section on the website (text).
output-abstract: 1. Backstory video, 2. Product sheets, 3. Success stories, 4. FAQ section.
output-detail: 1. Backstory video: Produce a video that narrates the founding story of the startup and its vision. 2. Product sheets: Design informative sheets detailing the features and benefits of the product. 3. Success stories: Record audio testimonials from satisfied customers sharing their experiences. 4. FAQ section: Compile a list of frequently asked questions about the product and its usage, providing text answers in an interactive web format.
